wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Sir Paul Anthony Travers   (15 August 1927 – 10 June 1983) was an English officer who was Quartermaster-General to the Forces.

response: * Lieutenant General Sir Paul Travers KCB, former Quartermaster-General to the Forces.
Promoted to Full General, Trant became Quartermaster-General in 1983, succeeding Sir Paul Travers, and joined the Army Board.
